name: Autumn Breeze
description:
The game was created for a game jam.  Specifically, Safer at Home - Spooktacular Game Jam (Spooktacular Game Jam Submission | 001 Game Creator).  

You're a bachelor and have been stuck living in the home for too long due to the pandemic, which is more commonly known as Covid-19.  As the days pass, you find yourself losing grip with reality due to the isolation.  While walking around your house you hear noises from your dreams that quickly alters your real life.
